name: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate and cook chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce.

name: Tandoori Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then cook in a tandoor.

name: Biryani
instructions: Cook rice and meat/vegetables with spices and yogurt.

name: Samosa
instructions: Fill dough with potato and pea mixture, then deep fry.

name: Naan
instructions: Bake flatbread dough in a tandoor.

name: Palak Paneer
instructions: Cook paneer cheese in a creamy spinach sauce.

name: Dal Makhani
instructions: Cook lentils with butter, cream, and spices.

name: Chana Masala
instructions: Cook chickpeas in a tomato-based sauce with spices.

name: Rogan Josh
instructions: Cook lamb in a yogurt-based sauce with spices.

name: Malai Kofta
instructions: Deep fry potato and paneer balls in a creamy sauce.

name: Aloo Gobi
instructions: Cook potatoes and cauliflower with spices.

name: Baingan Bharta
instructions: Roast and mash eggplant, then cook with tomatoes, onions, and spices.

name: Dosa
instructions: Ferment rice and lentil batter, then cook into thin crepes.

name: Idli
instructions: Steam fermented rice and lentil batter.

name: Vada
instructions: Deep fry spiced lentil batter.

name: Uttapam
instructions: Cook fermented rice and lentil batter with toppings.

name: Pani Puri
instructions: Fill fried dough balls with potato mixture and spiced water.

name: Bhel Puri
instructions: Mix puffed rice with vegetables and chutney.

name: Pav Bhaji
instructions: Serve bread with vegetable curry.

name: Chole Bhature
instructions: Serve chickpea curry with fried bread.

name: Gulab Jamun
instructions: Deep fry milk solid balls and soak in sugar syrup.

name: Jalebi
instructions: Deep fry batter in circular shapes and soak in sugar syrup.

name: Rasmalai
instructions: Cook paneer cheese balls in sweet milk.

name: Kaju Katli
instructions: Make cashew and sugar fudge.

name: Mysore Pak
instructions: Cook gram flour with sugar and ghee.

name: Modak
instructions: Steam rice flour dumplings filled with coconut and jaggery.

name: Payasam
instructions: Cook rice pudding with milk, sugar, and nuts.

name: Shrikhand
instructions: Strain yogurt, mix with sugar and saffron.

name: Aamras
instructions: Blend mangoes with sugar and cardamom.

name: Kulfi
instructions: Freeze reduced milk with sugar, nuts, and saffron.

name: Falooda
instructions: Layer rose syrup, milk, vermicelli, and basil seeds.

name: Masala Chai
instructions: Boil tea leaves with milk, spices, and sugar.

name: Lassi
instructions: Blend yogurt with water and sugar/salt.

name: Thandai
instructions: Blend milk with nuts, spices, and sugar.

name: Nimbu Pani (Lemonade)
instructions: Mix lemon juice with water, sugar, and salt.

name: Jaljeera
instructions: Mix spices with water.

name: Aloo Tikki
instructions: Fry spiced potato patties.

name: Dahi Vada
instructions: Soak lentil fritters in yogurt and top with chutney.

name: Kachori
instructions: Deep fry flour pastry filled with spiced lentils.

name: Pakora
instructions: Deep fry vegetable fritters.

name: Bread Pakora
instructions: Deep fry spiced bread fritters.

name: Sarson ka Saag
instructions: Cook mustard greens with spices and butter.

name: Makki ki Roti
instructions: Cook corn flour flatbreads.

name: Rajma Chawal
instructions: Cook kidney beans with spices and serve with rice.

name: Kadai Paneer
instructions: Cook paneer cheese with bell peppers, onions, and spices.

name: Vegetable Pulao
instructions: Cook rice with vegetables and spices.

name: Mutton Curry
instructions: Cook mutton in a tomato-based sauce with spices.

name: Fish Curry
instructions: Cook fish in a coconut milk-based sauce with spices.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Cook chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce with spices.

name: Vindaloo
instructions: Cook meat/vegetables with vinegar, potatoes, and spices.

name: Korma
instructions: Cook meat/vegetables in a creamy yogurt-based sauce with nuts and spices.

name: Saag Paneer
